sentence: However, those efforts seemed to fall flat on Tuesday after the biggest battle in the governor's race was won by Trump's rival Governor Brian Kemp, who easily defeated former Senator David Perdue.

title: Republican Who Said Elon Musk is African-American Faces Georgia Runoff
